name: Crossy - Inversion
description:
This game was originally made using PowerPoint 2019!

It is Highly Recommended to download the PowerPoint Version (Crossy - Inversion PPT.zip) if you own PowerPoint 2010 or above.

Only download the Executable Version (Crossy - Inversion EXE.zip) if you don't own PowerPoint 2010 or above, or PowerPoint in General. (Additional files may need to be installed)

 Google Slides, WPA Office, and Keynote will NOT work!

Welcome to Crossy - Inversion! A Maze game unlike any other maze game!

This game is played by traversing through the maze in Upside Down where up is down, and down is up.

This game is a submission for the Untitled Game Jam #32!

Featuring 4 amazing packs with over 25 Mind Boggling Levels to play, even the most experienced of Maze-Game players will sure to enjoy playing!

System Requirements (Recommended):

== OS == Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10

== Processor == 2.66Ghz Core 2 Duo or Greater

== Memory == 4 GB RAM

== Graphics == Any Intel HD Integrated Graphics or Better

== Storage == 150 MB (PPT version) / 150-300 MB (exe version)
